title: Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit | 25 Guided STEM Experiment Lessons | 48 Page Color Student Guide | Grades 3-6 | Ages 8+ | Play & Learn | Parents' Choice Silver Award Winner
descriptions:
**Product Name:** Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit

**Description:**

The Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit is an exciting electronic learning tool designed for students in grades 3-6 (ages 8 and up). This kit has received the prestigious Parents' Choice Silver Award, ensuring its quality and educational value.

**Features:**

- 25 guided experiments for hands-on learning
- A 48-page, full-color student guide
- A 60-page, full-color manual published in 2012

The kit includes an electric motor made of transparent plastic, allowing students to observe its inner workings. The motor can be powered by batteries or reconfigured to operate as a hand-crank electric generator. This versatile design encourages students to explore magnetic fields and electric current.

**Learning Outcomes:**

- Understanding of electric motor function
- Understanding of electric generator function
- Exploration of magnetic fields and electric current
- Building simple circuits
- Learning about gears and drive-trains

The kit also allows students to experiment with magnets and understand energy conversion, including converting kinetic energy to electrical energy and vice versa.

**Dimensions:**

- Height: 13.1 inches
- Width: 8.9 inches
- Depth: 2.6 inches
- Weight: 1.3 pounds

This science kit is an excellent resource for STEM education, providing a fun and engaging way for students to learn about motors, generators, and energy conversion.
